resources.string: Oops! Seems like you don\'t have that one app Spring consumes to perform its voodoo magic.
Storage access is needed to decrypt/download songs
Done! Find the decrypted song in save location
There was a problem decrypting this song.
Not enough space. Do some housekeeping!
Downloading. Song will be saved in save location
The song is unavailable for download
There was an error processing this
Spring is unable to find songs saved offline
You have no songs saved offline
Nothing here. Spring can decrypt songs if you saved them for offline playback.
Share a song, album or a playlist with Spring and it will pop up here for you to download anytime.
You haven\'t shared anything with Spring yet
There was an error with the network
Oops! Unable to reach the server.
Ouch! Server rejected the request. Retry later.
Whoops! Something\'s wrong with the network.
Get your favourite songs in your pocket!
Click on the share button of a playlist, album or a songâ€¦
scroll to the right and share it with Spring to start downloading
Spring can also decrypt songs you saved offline, so you can play them in any other music player!
